thread.title: Fire engulfs several floors of Istanbul hospital building

author: cnbc.com
title: Fire engulfs several floors of Istanbul hospital building

organizations.name: gaziosmanpasa taksim educational and research hospital

text:
Fire engulfs several floors of Istanbul hospital building Published 2 Hours Ago Reuters 
Fire engulfed several floors of a hospital in western Istanbul on Thursday, live television footage showed. 
Broadcaster NTV said buildings in the vicinity of the Gaziosmanpasa Taksim Educational and Research Hospital were being evacuated, and firefighters were battling the fire. 
There were no immediate reports of casualties.
